item.title: No title
item.description: The UNI men's basketball team is dancing. Today, we talk about the NCAA Tournament bound UNI Panthers and their MVC Tournament Title in St Louis with head coach Ben Jacobson. We show you why three Panthers landed on the All-Tournament team. We look at why the UNI women's basketball team is the number 1 seed at this weekends MVC Tournament. And we show you one of the wrestlers qualified for the NCAA Championships in New York City.

item.title: No title
item.description: In this weeks show preview the NCAA Wrestling Championships with head coach Doug Schwab. We look at the seniors that have left their legacy in more ways than the regular season title on the women's hoops team. We look back at a recent inductee in the UNI Hall of Fame, former coach Greg McDermott. We also recap a record setting UNI Swimming and Diving season.
